skillTiers.name: Precision
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator knows the weak spots in the body of their enemies and is able to hit them with high precision.

skillTiers.name: Swipe
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator spins and hits all enemies around him.

skillTiers.name: Slash
skillTiers.description: The most basic attack in the Gladiator's set of skills is two fast slashes in quick succession.

skillTiers.name: Master at Arms
skillTiers.description: Long years of training enabled the Gladiator to wield any weapon masterfully.

skillTiers.name: Charge
skillTiers.description: A quick sprint towards an unsuspecting enemies can end a lot of battles before they even begin.

skillTiers.name: Ground slam
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator slams the ground with their bare fists causing a small earthquake that damages enemies and makes them unable to act for a short time.

skillTiers.name: Cut Throat
skillTiers.description: Even while spinning, a skilled fighter is able to hit their enemies throats.

skillTiers.name: Killing Blow
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator unleashes their fury in a single hit to hit an enemy with deadly force.

skillTiers.name: Strike
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator strikes a single enemy with their weapon.

skillTiers.name: Vigor
skillTiers.description: Gladiators have learned to mend their wounds in the middle of a battle, making them very durable in longer fights.

skillTiers.name: Shock
skillTiers.description: The shock of the tremor forces the opponents to their knees.

skillTiers.name: Legendary Weapon
skillTiers.description: If a Gladiator manages to find a weapon of significant power, they becomes un unstoppable force on the battlefield.

skillTiers.name: Smash
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator smashes their weapon down onto an enemies head, crushing it or leaving them unconscious.

skillTiers.name: Spikes
skillTiers.description: Sharp rock spikes emerge from the ground that pierce the ankles of foes around the impact.

skillTiers.name: Purging Weapon
skillTiers.description: Even though Gladiators are not particularely religious, they learned how to infuse their weapon with the power of a combat blessing that makes it surprisingly effective against dark creatures.

skillTiers.name: Heavy Swing
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator smashes multiple enemies with even greater power.

skillTiers.name: Battle Song
skillTiers.description: In order to motivate themselves and intimidate their enemies, the Gladiators sing a song of slaughter and carnage.

skillTiers.name: Ephemeral Power
skillTiers.description: The power of pure will allows the Gladiator to hit repeatedly with incredible strength, even empowering elemental attacks.

skillTiers.name: Melody Of War
skillTiers.description: The melody of war is the clash of swords, the shattering of bones and the screams of dying warriors.

skillTiers.name: Lucky Hit
skillTiers.description: A fight is not always decided by skill. Sometimes, pure luck determines the outcome of a battle.

skillTiers.name: Critical Eye
skillTiers.description: The Gladiator learned to focus their vision to be able to see the weakness in their enemies defense. Although, they can not maintain that level of concentration for a long time while fighting.

skillTiers.name: Berserk
skillTiers.description: Some Gladiators lose all restraint when in combat. They furiously hit everything in their path and cause absolute devastation. Thereby, they do not waste a single thought on their protection.

skillTiers.name: Rifts
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker creates six rifts around them that are connected to other dimensions. However, they are too unstable to be used for traveling. Any body part of a creature that touches one of the rifts is cut of and transferred to another plain.

skillTiers.name: Jump!
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker connects their body to the plain of storms, allowing them to rush through space as if they were ethereal.

skillTiers.name: Interdimensional Weapons
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker reforges their weapons in different dimensions. Allowing them to easily carry the weight of one weapon in each hand and also enhancing their destructive power with elemental energy.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Axe, Mace, Thrown Weapon, Sword, Dual Wield Only

skillTiers.name: Void Slash
skillTiers.description: A breach opens from the blade of the Rift Walker when they strike, causing interdimensional energy to flow out and damage anything in its path.

skillTiers.name: Anomaly
skillTiers.description: The body of the Rift Walker is infused with dimensional energy. Disrupting its stability by hurting the Rift Walker, might cause a portal to open spontaneously, unleashing destructive energy in a radius around them.

skillTiers.name: Storm Dimension
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker has an affinity to the storm dimension, allowing them to move faster and enhance their lightning spells.

skillTiers.name: Cold Rifts
skillTiers.description: The rifts are enhanced with an unstable connection to the dimension of frost, causing them to emit ice cold air.

skillTiers.name: Explosive Shift
skillTiers.description: When fully reappearing in reality, an explosion of storm energy is unleashed from the Rift Walker's weapon.

skillTiers.name: Teleport Attack
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker vanishes to another dimension, preparing an ambush. When they reappear, they immediately strike the weak spot of an enemy with devastating precision.

skillTiers.name: Burning Rifts
skillTiers.description: The plain of fire is connected to the rifts. This connection causes the rifts to burn anything they touch.

skillTiers.name: Vacuum
skillTiers.description: The breach absorbs any air nearby, making it impossible for any spell caster to speak magical words.

skillTiers.name: Heat Aberration
skillTiers.description: The anomaly has an affinity to the dimension of fire, causing the portal to emit high heat that melts away armor.

skillTiers.name: Frost Dimension
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker has an affinity to the frost dimension. Their armor is coated in ice crystals which greatly enhances its defensive capabilities and strengthens the Rift Walker's frost spells.

skillTiers.name: IceBreach
skillTiers.description: The breach is connected to the dimension of ice, causing frost to emmit from the breach that freezes flesh in an instant.

skillTiers.name: Portal to Hell
skillTiers.description: Even the plain of eternal punishment was part of the Rift Walker's expeditions to other dimensions. They open a portal to hell that unleashes fire at the world of the living.

skillTiers.name: Partial Shift
skillTiers.description: When hit, the Rift Walker might send parts of their body to another plain, making it much harder to harm them and even granting them easier access to spell energy.

skillTiers.name: Inferno Dimension
skillTiers.description: The Rift Walker has an affinity to the frost dimension. They fully embrace the destructive power of fire, not only strengthening their fire spells, but increasing all damage they cause.

skillTiers.name: Blink
skillTiers.description: With time, the Rift Walker learns how to recover faster from travelling to other dimensions and even bring destructive forces with them when they return.

skillTiers.name: Master of Worlds
skillTiers.description: For a short time, the Rift Walker connects their mind and body to all dimensions simultaneously, letting them ascend to a god. In this state, every hit is empowered by elemental energy and all spells benefit from a massive increase in power.

skillTiers.name: Time Travel
skillTiers.description: After all, travelling between dimensions is not much different from travelling time. The Rift Walker learned how to return a few seconds to the past to regain strength.

skillTiers.name: Dimensional Chasm
skillTiers.description: Opening a portal to the void is risky but also brings the potential to inflict massive damage. The chasm is connected to multiple dimension and emits energy in a very large radius. Better stay away if a Rift Walker chooses to open a dimensional chasm.

skillTiers.name: Immortality
skillTiers.description: Some Rift Walkers exist in multiple plains at the same time, making it impossible to kill them. In times of immediate danger, they will simply send a part of their essence to another plain to become immortal for a short time.

skillTiers.name: Decoy
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist creates multiple decoys of themselves to confuse and distract enemies. The decoys might be weaker than the original but they will still use their weapons to attack.

Unstable Illusions.name: Unstable Illusions
Unstable Illusions.description: The Illusionist infuses their decoys with unstable elemental energy that unleashes in an explosion when the decoy is destroyed.

skillTiers.name: Shockwave
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist emits a shockwave from their fingertips that strikes foes as if it was made of solid matter.

skillTiers.name: Mind over Matter
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist mastered the art of controlling strengthening the mind and body of allies with beneficial illusions.

skillTiers.name: Mind Blast
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist sends out a concentrated thought to attack a foes mind.

skillTiers.name: Unstable Illusions
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist infuses their decoys with unstable elemental energy that unleashes in an explosion when the decoy is destroyed.

skillTiers.name: Teleport
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist teleports behind an enemy before sending them to sleep with a gentle touch.

skillTiers.name: Confusing Mist
skillTiers.description: A colourful mist is conjured in a large area. Creatures cought in this mist might see strange images distracting them from any target they might persue at the moment.

skillTiers.name: Mind Destruction
skillTiers.description: The mind blast is strengthened further by unleashing elemental energy inside an enemy's head.

skillTiers.name: Hyperfocus
skillTiers.description: By focusing the concentration for a short time, the Illusionist is capable to greatly enhance their mental capacity.

skillTiers.name: Mental Blockade
skillTiers.description: A wall of purple, slow moving gas is conjured in front of the Illusionist. Creatures the touch the illusion feel like they have a solid wall right in front of their face.

skillTiers.name: Stunning Magic
skillTiers.description: The shockwave hits enemies with great force, making them unable to act for a brief moment.

skillTiers.name: Chromatic Mist
skillTiers.description: The illusions in the mist are charged with elemental magic and might unleash a strike of fire, ice or lightning at enemies within the mist.

skillTiers.name: Painful Thoughts
skillTiers.description: Creatures touched by the wall actually believe they just run into an obstacle. This thought is strong enough to actually harm their bodies.

skillTiers.name: Colorful Illusion
skillTiers.description: The shockwave is infused with elemental magic that causes even greater damage.

skillTiers.name: Eternal Mist
skillTiers.description: The mist persists for a much longer time and the illusions within are enhanced with even greater damaging power.

skillTiers.name: Clone Self
skillTiers.description: The Illusionist creates an actual copy of themselves. It might just be an illusion, but it is impossible to tell the difference from the original. The illusion even imitates the spells of their creator.

skillTiers.name: Mind Control
skillTiers.description: By creating false memories and feelings in the mind of an enemy, the Illusionist tricks them to believe they are allies. Eventually, the creature will realize it has been charmed and turn against the mage who tricked them.

skillTiers.name: Army of Mirages
skillTiers.description: Mastering the art of illusions allows the Illusionist to create countless copies of themselves.

skillTiers.name: Mind Slave
skillTiers.description: The mind bending magic is much more subtle, making it much harder for the victim to realize they are manipulated by illusions.

skillTiers.name: Karma
skillTiers.description: Hitting an Illusionist is never a good idea. They might learn to store elemental energy in their body that unleashes at every foe nearby when the Illusionist is being hurt.

skillTiers.name: Master of Clones
skillTiers.description: By further refining the spell, the Illusionist is capable to keep the illusion of themselves alive for much longer.

skillTiers.name: Mental Blade
skillTiers.description: Pure mental energy is channeled into a weapon for a short time, even morphing parts of the physical components into pure energy.

skillTiers.name: Shatter
skillTiers.description: The knight strikes with their shield shattering multiple enemies at once.

skillTiers.name: Distortion
skillTiers.description: The shards of the shattered mirror pierces the skin of enemies and even breaks their armor.

skillTiers.name: Shields up!
skillTiers.description: The knight raises their shield to drastically increase their defensive potential but slowing down their movement.

skillTiers.name: Thorn Mirror
skillTiers.description: Thorns grow from the mirror armor of the knight, hurting everybody who attacks them in close combat.

skillTiers.name: Harden Steel
skillTiers.description: The Mirror Knight is able to harden the steel of their armor to increase its defensive potential.

skillTiers.name: Plate Armor
skillTiers.description: Years of training allow the Mirror Knights to wear equipment that would be too heavy for normal human beings.

skillTiers.name: Dark Mirror
skillTiers.description: Some Mirror Knights infuse their armor with dark magic killing any attacker slow and painfully.

skillTiers.name: Bad Luck
skillTiers.description: Shattering a mirror, even a mirror shield results in seven years of bad luck - for the enemies!

skillTiers.name: Perfect Defense
skillTiers.description: Hardly anything is harder to harm than a Mirror Knight in their defensive stance.

skillTiers.name: Reflective Armor
skillTiers.description: The knights' armor reflects weapon attacks, arrows and even spells back at the attacker.

skillTiers.name: Broken Glass
skillTiers.description: The shards of the shattered mirror pierces the skin of enemies and even breaks their armor.

skillTiers.name: Protector
skillTiers.description: Some knights learn to use protective magic to prevent any physical damage from an ally.

skillTiers.name: Prismatic Mirror
skillTiers.description: Friendly mages enchant the armor of their allied Mirror Knights to burn, freeze and shock any attacker with arcane power.

skillTiers.name: Unbreakable
skillTiers.description: The Mirrorknights' armor and shield can never be destroyed or damaged in any way, neither the knight wearing it.

skillTiers.name: Reflective Skin
skillTiers.description: Mirrorknights can turn their very skin into a mirror and reflect everything that might be thrown at them.

skillTiers.name: Fractured World
skillTiers.description: Shards of light appear in an area cutting every being before imploding while causing even greater damage.

skillTiers.name: Obsidian Mirror
skillTiers.description: Some Mirrorknights turn their armor into obsidian. Hitting this hard material causes a shock stunning the attacker briefly.

skillTiers.name: Magnify
skillTiers.description: The power of their shield magnifies the knight and increases their power.

skillTiers.name: Diamond Heart
skillTiers.description: When the Mirror Knight is wounded, their diamond heart begins to pulse and greatly increase their defensive, making it almost impossible to detain them.

skillTiers.name: Crystal Mirror
skillTiers.description: The crystalline structure of the knights' armor blunts every weapon that hits it.

skillTiers.name: Fracture Light
skillTiers.description: Sometimes when the Mirror Knight strikes an enemy, fractures of light erupt from their shield and cause even greater harm.

skillTiers.name: True Reflection
skillTiers.description: For a very short time, the Mirror Knight increases the reflective powers of their armor dramatically, throwing everything with massive force back at every attacker.

skillTiers.name: Strength of the Ocean
skillTiers.description: The ocean washes away even the biggest and heaviest weapons effortlessly.

skillTiers.name: Rain
skillTiers.description: Clouds form above the head of the Tidecaller. Fighting in the rain strengthens the regenerative abilities of the Tidecaller and their allies.

Rain.name: Rain
Rain.description: Clouds form above the head of the Tidecaller. Fighting in the rain strengthens the regenerative abilities of the Tidecaller and their allies.

Empowering Waters.name: Empowering Waters
Empowering Waters.description: The rain amplifies the offensive power of the Tidecaller and their allies.

Monsoon.name: Monsoon
Monsoon.description: The floods falling from the skies makes it harder for foes to move and react in combat.

Ice Rain.name: Ice Rain
Ice Rain.description: Freezing drops of water fall down on the Tidecallers' enemies, hurting their skin and sometimes covering them in ice.

skillTiers.name: Water Cannon
skillTiers.description: A splash of water shot at high speed hits harder than any arrow.

skillTiers.name: Monsoon
skillTiers.description: The floods falling from the skies makes it harder for foes to move and react in combat.

skillTiers.name: Liquid Weapon
skillTiers.description: Weapons coated in magic water rip through flesh and freezes the blood dripping out of the wounds which causes deadly injuries.

skillTiers.name: Liquefy
skillTiers.description: A true master of water magic may learn to liquefy their own body and travel at incredible speed.

skillTiers.name: Summon Water Spirit
skillTiers.description: Giving live to water summons a friendly spirit that is unable to harm any being but can cure the injuries of its master with ease.

Healing Waters.name: Healing Waters
Healing Waters.description: The healing waters close wounds within a few moments.

Chilling Touch.name: Chilling Touch
Chilling Touch.description: While not aggressive by nature, the water spirit is still able to defend itself and increase the combative power of its allies.

Flow like a River.name: Flow like a River
Flow like a River.description: The spirit injects the flowing energy of a river into an ally, giving them access to more energy and refreshing their thoughts.

Spirits Revenge.name: Spirits Revenge
Spirits Revenge.description: Seeing its friends being hurt enrages the spirit, causing it to increase the offensive power of its allies massively.

skillTiers.name: Water Slicer
skillTiers.description: The water twists and bends to pierce straight through the body of any creature.

skillTiers.name: Floating
skillTiers.description: The liquid state of a body makes it much harder to hinder its movement.

skillTiers.name: Chilling Touch
skillTiers.description: While not aggressive by nature, the water spirit is still able to defend itself and increase the combative power of its allies.

skillTiers.name: Iceblock
skillTiers.description: When in danger, the Tidecaller is able to freeze their body in a block of ice and protecting himself from all damage for a short time.

skillTiers.name: Rejuvenating Waters
skillTiers.description: The water coating the weapon of the tidecaller slowly heals their wounds and allows them to act more nimble in battle.

skillTiers.name: Torrent
skillTiers.description: Pulsing streams of water emerge from the liquefied body allowing it to maintain its fluid state for a longer period of time.

skillTiers.name: Flash Freeze
skillTiers.description: Touching the magical ice hurts the attacker and chills their body.

skillTiers.name: Ice Rain
skillTiers.description: Freezing drops of water fall down on the Tidecallers' enemies, hurting their skin and sometimes covering them in ice.

skillTiers.name: Power of Tides
skillTiers.description: A permanent state of flood further increases the destructive force of the Tidecallers' weapons.

skillTiers.name: Flow like a River
skillTiers.description: The spirit injects the flowing energy of a river into an ally, giving them access to more energy and refreshing their thoughts.

skillTiers.name: Empowering Waters
skillTiers.description: The rain amplifies the offensive power of the Tidecaller and their allies.

skillTiers.name: Flood
skillTiers.description: Even more water emerges from the hand of the Tidecaller to drown their enemies.

skillTiers.name: Blizzard
skillTiers.description: Ice crystals fall from the sky smashing any creature unlucky enough to stand at their point of impact.

skillTiers.name: Spirits Revenge
skillTiers.description: Seeing its friends being hurt enrages the spirit, causing it to increase the offensive power of its allies massively.

skillTiers.name: Maelstrom
skillTiers.description: The Tidecaller rips the water out off the air. Creatures caught within this devastating magic are dehydrated within an instant.

skillTiers.name: Chain Lightning
skillTiers.description: A lightning bolt unleashes from the palm of the Tempest that jumps from one enemy to the next.

skillTiers.name: Lightning Armor
skillTiers.description: Electric energy is channeled into the armor and clothes of the tempest increasing its protective properties and making it almost impossible to break the concentration of the Tempest when they are channeling spells.

skillTiers.name: Lightning Sword
skillTiers.description: The Tempest infuses their weapon with lightning to increase its damaging potential.

skillTiers.name: Nerve Paralysis
skillTiers.description: Subtle electric impulses are sent into the body of foes that disrupt their reaction making it much harder for them to defend themselves.

skillTiers.name: Lightning Speed
skillTiers.description: Dealing with lightning for their whole life allowed the Tempest to absorb some of its accelerating properties.

skillTiers.name: Electric Sigil
skillTiers.description: The tempest conjures electric sigils on the ground that are highly unstable. Any foe touching such a sigil will unleash an explosion of lightning.

skillTiers.name: Crackle
skillTiers.description: The lightning bolt is enhanced with energy draining properties and an afterburn effect that burns the flesh of victims long after the lightning passed by.

skillTiers.name: Disorder
skillTiers.description: The electric signals inside a victims body are completely disrupted, leaving them open to all kinds of negative energy and even making it easier to drain their energy.

skillTiers.name: Stasis
skillTiers.description: The Tempest shocks themselves for a short time to repel any harmful force coming near them for a short time. However, this process also makes it impossible for them to attack.

skillTiers.name: Rush Of Energy
skillTiers.description: The invigorating power of electricity allows the Tempest to regenerate their energy very fast for a short time.

skillTiers.name: Electrocution
skillTiers.description: The sigils explode with shocking force, leaving the victim twitching in pain.

skillTiers.name: Power Transfer
skillTiers.description: By sapping the nerves of a victim, the Tempest rabidly drains all energy from their body to fuel their own spells.

skillTiers.name: Static Nova
skillTiers.description: A crackling wave of energy is unleashed around the tempest, burning all creatures that are unlucky enough to stand close.

skillTiers.name: Arc
skillTiers.description: The lightning is enhanced with even more electric energy, greatly increasing its destructive potential.

skillTiers.name: Voltage
skillTiers.description: Any foe that is foolish enough to attack the Tempest while they are in stasis is struck by a lightning. Even the energy of spells that hit the Tempest is absorbed and added to their own power.

skillTiers.name: EMP
skillTiers.description: The Tempest sends out a pulse of electric energy that disrupts the structure of all magic, destroying any beneficial spell that might have affected foes in the area.

skillTiers.name: Lightning Affinity
skillTiers.description: Parts of the body of the Tempest consists of electric energy due to the frequent exposure of the cells to lightning. This further enhances the power of lightning spells and makes it almost impossible to harm the Tempest with electricity.

skillTiers.name: Overload
skillTiers.description: The static energy in the air around Tempest is further increased which causes any victim to black out for a moment.

skillTiers.name: Afterburn
skillTiers.description: The disruptive energy lingers in the air around the place of impact for a short time after the initial blast has already vanished. This stops enemies from being able to focus their own energy to cast spells.

skillTiers.name: Thunder
skillTiers.description: Thunder shakes the air in an area. The loud noise stuns enemies and the static energy in the air burns the magic energy in their bodies.

skillTiers.name: Sleeping Storm
skillTiers.description: The Tempest learned how to take the energy from a complete storm and channel them into dozens of sigils that are distributed on entire surface of the battlefield.

skillTiers.name: Divine Lightning
skillTiers.description: The Tempest learned how to draw static energy from natural sources. They control energy to form in the clouds above until it reaches a critical point. This results in a more devastating lightning strike than any storm could ever cause naturally. The lightning disintegrates everything near the point of impact within an instant.

skillTiers.name: Twin Fangs
skillTiers.description: The Vampire wields melee weapons in both hands to attack with great speed.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Axe, Mace, Thrown Weapon, Sword, Dual Wield Only

skillTiers.name: Bloodthirsty
skillTiers.description: The thirst for blood drains the Vampire's power but also allows them to drink the victims blood to restore their life.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Axe, Bow, Mace, Thrown Weapon, Spear, Staff, Sword

skillTiers.name: Supernatural Agility
skillTiers.description: Mutated genes allow the Vampire to move faster than any living creature ever could.

skillTiers.name: Wrath
skillTiers.description: When hit, the vampire falls into a mindless frenzy increasing their ability to physically injure their enemies.

skillTiers.name: Bite
skillTiers.description: The Vampire launches two sharp fangs from their palm.

skillTiers.name: Blood Rain
skillTiers.description: The blood of countless fallen enemies rains out of black clouds and pierces the skin of those underneath them causing heavy bleeding.

skillTiers.name: Mangle
skillTiers.description: The Vampire rips a single enemy into pieces with supernatural power.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Axe, Mace, Sword, Dual Wield Only

skillTiers.name: Elegance
skillTiers.description: The Vampire's natural agility when thirsting for blood allows them to avoid strikes and find gaps in the enemies defense.

skillTiers.name: Boiling Blood
skillTiers.description: The blood is boiling hot and burns the skin of the creatures that are hit by the blood.

skillTiers.name: Create Ghoul
skillTiers.description: The Vampire turns a bitten victim into a ghoul and summons it as reinforcement.

For the Master.name: For the Master
For the Master.description: The ghoul drains the life from an opponent and transfers it to their master.

skillTiers.name: Spite
skillTiers.description: A Vampire is almost impossible to detain when they are in battle frenzy.

skillTiers.name: Sharp Fangs
skillTiers.description: The fangs are thrown with such force they penetrate the victims body and cause heavy bleeding.

skillTiers.name: For the Master
skillTiers.description: The ghoul drains the life from an opponent and transfers it to their master.

skillTiers.name: Feed
skillTiers.description: The Vampire bites multiple enemies to drink their blood and restore their own life.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Axe, Mace, Sword, Dual Wield Only

skillTiers.name: Eviscerate
skillTiers.description: The Vampire bypasses the armor of their opponent to tear out their intestines.

skillTiers.name: Deep Wounds
skillTiers.description: When wrathful, the Vampire gains even greater control of the blood in the veins of their victims.

skillTiers.name: Mist Form
skillTiers.description: The Vampire transforms himself into mist which makes it much more difficult to harm them, but also prevents him from attacking with full efficiency. This transformation rapidly drains the Vampire's magic power.

skillTiers.name: Hunger
skillTiers.description: The Vampire's hunger for blood allows him to regrow their fangs at a much faster rate.

skillTiers.name: Blood Torrent
skillTiers.description: Floods of blood fall from the sky on the Vampire's command.

skillTiers.name: Elusive Mist
skillTiers.description: While in mist form, the Vampire is able to avoid attacks with ease.

skillTiers.name: Devastation
skillTiers.description: The Vampire performs a powerful blow to break the bones of multiple foes.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Axe, Mace, Sword, Dual Wield Only

skillTiers.name: Cloak of Darkness
skillTiers.description: The Vampire is shrouded in dark magic which greatly increases their offensive power.

skillTiers.name: Plague Bearer
skillTiers.description: The Plaguelord throws rotten globes of diseased magic that create infested rats upon impact.

Bone Shrapnels.name: Bone Shrapnels
Bone Shrapnels.description: The rats explode with such force that their bones become deadly projectiles.

Bloated Bodies.name: Bloated Bodies
Bloated Bodies.description: The bodies of the rats is filled with gas that makes them burst with incredible power.

skillTiers.name: Spread Plague
skillTiers.description: Standing near a Plaguelord is enough to poison a living creature's body making them die a slow, painful death.

skillTiers.name: ToxicWood
skillTiers.description: The Plaguelord treats their bow with a short lasting, but very deadly poison.

skillTiers.name: Fever
skillTiers.description: Fever is caused by the Plaguelord's presence that restricts the ability of creatures to react to attacks.

skillTiers.name: Rotting Body
skillTiers.description: Being around diseases and rats all the time also affected the Plaguelord's body. But instead of weakening them, it further increases their ability to spread sickness.

skillTiers.name: Narcolepsy
skillTiers.description: A sleeping disease is spread in an area, instantly causing all creatures to fall asleep.

skillTiers.name: Bone Shrapnels
skillTiers.description: The rats explode with such force that their bones become deadly projectiles.

skillTiers.name: Stinging Pain
skillTiers.description: A common symptom of the Plaguelord's diseased magic is a stinging pain in the torso of affected creatures.{^n}{^g}Modifies Spread Plague

skillTiers.name: Gas Explosion
skillTiers.description: Toxic gas emmits from the Plaguelord's body in a violent explosion.

skillTiers.name: Immunity
skillTiers.description: Being the cause of sickness and disease makes the Plaguelord very resistant against all kinds of poisons and illnesses.

skillTiers.name: Infestation
skillTiers.description: The Plaguelord summons even more rats to infest the land.

skillTiers.name: Coughing Blood
skillTiers.description: In a later stage of the disease, the victims cough blood.{^n}{^g}Modifies Spread Plague

skillTiers.name: Splinter
skillTiers.description: When the poisoned arrow pierces a target, it bursts into pieces, harming everything around it.

skillTiers.name: Immune Suppression
skillTiers.description: The immune system starts to collapse and leaves the victim without protection against dieseases.{^n}{^g}Modifies Fever

skillTiers.name: Neurotoxin
skillTiers.description: The poison on the arrow is mixed with a dangerous substance that causes hallucination.

skillTiers.name: Elemental Decay
skillTiers.description: A strange side effect of living in a rotting body is an increase of the affinity to elemental magic. Sacrifice always comes with greater power.

skillTiers.name: DeadlyDisease
skillTiers.description: Practicing the depraved arts of plague summoning allows the Plaguelord to create deadlier and longer lasting diseases.

skillTiers.name: Bloated Bodies
skillTiers.description: The bodies of the rats is filled with gas that makes them burst with incredible power.

skillTiers.name: Weakness
skillTiers.description: Sick enemies are too weak to cause serious harm to the Plaguelord or their allies.{^n}{^g}Modifies Fever

skillTiers.name: Asphyxiant Gas
skillTiers.description: The gas makes it impossible to breath and therefore makes it impossible to cast spells.

skillTiers.name: BlackDeath
skillTiers.description: When the Plaguelord masters their corrupted magic, death comes to entire armies within a very short time. There is no escape.{^n}{^g}Modifies Spread Plague

skillTiers.name: Touch of Death
skillTiers.description: If being near a Plaguelord is enough to kill a creature within seconds, what will a touch do to the body of an unlucky victim?

skillTiers.name: Summon Archangel
skillTiers.description: Warriors from the heavens descend to assist the Angel in battle with the power of the elements.

Judgement day.name: Judgement day
Judgement day.description: The archangels unleash judgement day to punish the sinners.

Smite.name: Smite
Smite.description: The power of the elements is called down from the heavens to smite the guilty.

skillTiers.name: Summon Seraph
skillTiers.description: The Angel summons the servants of the gods a shatter their enemies.

Scorch.name: Scorch
Scorch.description: The Seraphs burn their foes with every touch of their hands until only ashes remain.

Rapture.name: Rapture
Rapture.description: The Seraphs go into raptures in anticipation of the lavish feasts in heaven.

skillTiers.name: Holy fire
skillTiers.description: The Angel conjures searing flames to burn their enemies with heavenly wrath.

skillTiers.name: Judgement day
skillTiers.description: The archangels unleash judgement day to punish the sinners.

skillTiers.name: Bolt of light
skillTiers.description: The angel launches a projectile of pure light.

skillTiers.name: Summon Purifier
skillTiers.description: The Purifier is one of the most powerful weapons of heaven to obliterate the sinners.

Provoke.name: Provoke
Provoke.description: Provokes enemies to draw their attention away from allies.

Elemental maelstrom.name: Elemental maelstrom
Elemental maelstrom.description: The presence of the purifier destroys everything in its path.

Retaliation.name: Retaliation
Retaliation.description: Hitting the Purifier never remains unpunished.

Purge.name: Purge
Purge.description: The Purifier burns away the sins with the force of the elements.

skillTiers.name: Pray for power
skillTiers.description: Even Angels pray to god in difficult situations to overcome their enemies.

skillTiers.name: Scorch
skillTiers.description: The Seraphs burn their foes with every touch of their hands until only ashes remain.

skillTiers.name: Sacred flames
skillTiers.description: Only the flames of heaven burn hotter than the fires of hell.

skillTiers.name: Shatter light
skillTiers.description: The light projectile splits into fragments to singe multiple enemies at once and ripping their energy from their bodies.

skillTiers.name: Smite
skillTiers.description: The power of the elements is called down from the heavens to smite the guilty.

skillTiers.name: Afterglow
skillTiers.description: The bolt detonates for even greater destruction.

skillTiers.name: Purge
skillTiers.description: The Purifier burns away the sins with the force of the elements.

skillTiers.name: Pray for endurance
skillTiers.description: Praying to god grants the Angel a longer life and resistance to the forces of nature.

skillTiers.name: Mortification
skillTiers.description: Evil creatures immediately lose their powers as soon as the holy fire touches their rotten skin.

skillTiers.name: Pray for revenge
skillTiers.description: God commands the Angel to destroy unholy creatures wherever they may be found.

skillTiers.name: Godlike
skillTiers.description: Only the most powerful Angels gain enough might to come close to godhood.

skillTiers.name: Rapture
skillTiers.description: The Seraphs go into raptures in anticipation of the lavish feasts in heaven.

skillTiers.name: Divine favor
skillTiers.description: God holds their protective hands over their most loyal servants and letting them summons divine warriors faster and more often.

skillTiers.name: Divine intervention
skillTiers.description: When close to death, god may save their Angels by restoring their power.

skillTiers.name: Punishment
skillTiers.description: The flames conjured by the angel burn away any protection to the forces of heaven.

skillTiers.name: Heaven on earth
skillTiers.description: Long time ago, the paradise existed on earth. Through prayer, Eden may be on earth for a few seconds to please the loyal servants of god.

skillTiers.name: Unstable Power
skillTiers.description: The Ritualist infuses their staff with unstable energy to unleash exploding projectiles with even more destructive force.

skillTiers.name: Summon Demon Soldier
skillTiers.description: Demon Soldiers form the backbone of the forces of hell. These expendable but surprisingly resilient fighters decimate their enemies with unholy blades created in the hottest fires of hell.

Hunger for Death.name: Hunger for Death
Hunger for Death.description: The Demon Soldiers' thirst for blood makes them rush into battle with even higher speed.

Fiendish Mutation.name: Fiendish Mutation
Fiendish Mutation.description: The demonic nature of the Demon Soldiers lets them regenerate health and gives them better reflexes when they are wounded.

skillTiers.name: Sacrifice
skillTiers.description: Sacrificing their own blood is one of the preferred ways of Ritualists to gain greater power.

skillTiers.name: Heresy
skillTiers.description: Free from the doctrines of Church, the Ritualist can use even the darkest artifacts for greater power.

skillTiers.name: Summon Demon Archer
skillTiers.description: The Demon Archers let their arrows rain on their foes from the backline of the battle formation with great effect.

Piercing Shot.name: Piercing Shot
Piercing Shot.description: The arrows of the Demon Archers hit with enough force to pierce armor, flesh and bones alike.

skillTiers.name: Curse
skillTiers.description: A talented Ritualist's curses are causing terrible pain to its victim and can spread to erase the population of entire villages.

skillTiers.name: Dark Ritual
skillTiers.description: The ritual circle infuses the weapon of the Ritualist with life destroying energy and enhances all of their senses.

Dark Ritual.name: Dark Ritual
Dark Ritual.description: The ritual circle infuses the weapon of the Ritualist with life destroying energy and enhances all of their senses.

Terrifying Presence.name: Terrifying Presence
Terrifying Presence.description: Whitnessing the cruel practices used during a dark ritual fills even the bravest hearts with fear.

skillTiers.name: Pervasive Force
skillTiers.description: Channeling dark power into the staff causes its projectiles to fly with higher velocity and even let them penetrate flesh.

skillTiers.name: Hunger for Death
skillTiers.description: The Demon Soldiers' thirst for blood makes them rush into battle with even higher speed.

skillTiers.name: Madness
skillTiers.description: The unbearable pain caused by the curse makes the victims to go insane until they tear each other apart.

skillTiers.name: Terrifying Presence
skillTiers.description: Whitnessing the cruel practices used during a dark ritual fills even the bravest hearts with fear.

skillTiers.name: Piercing Shot
skillTiers.description: The arrows of the Demon Archers hit with enough force to pierce armor, flesh and bones alike.

skillTiers.name: Banishing Spell
skillTiers.description: Not even the spirits of the dead can escape a Ritualist's curse.

skillTiers.name: Fiendish Mutation
skillTiers.description: The demonic nature of the Demon Soldiers lets them regenerate health and gives them better reflexes when they are wounded.

skillTiers.name: Summon Necromancer
skillTiers.description: Necromancy was born in the darkest corners of hell. A Demon Necromancer can conjure an undead army by speaking just a single depraved word.

Summon Demonic Skeletons.name: Summon Demonic Skeletons
Summon Demonic Skeletons.description: The Demon Necromancer animates the skeletons of their foes to fight their former allies.

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.description: The Demon Necromancer shouts a word of madness causing their allies to attack with mindless cruelty.

skillTiers.name: Void
skillTiers.description: The Ritualist whispers a forbidden spell to tears a hole in the very essence of the world.

skillTiers.name: Vicious Energy
skillTiers.description: The madness of the Ritualist's mind corrupts their staff until it rips the very life of every creature stroke by its malicious energy.

skillTiers.name: Frenzy
skillTiers.description: The Demon Necromancer shouts a word of madness causing their allies to attack with mindless cruelty.

skillTiers.name: Dissolve Life
skillTiers.description: All life caught in the void is immediately erased. The Ritualist feeds on the essence of the extinguished creatures to empower their own body.

skillTiers.name: Power Overwhelming
skillTiers.description: Blood magic quickens reflexes and boosts the damage potential of spells and even strikes with regular weapons.

skillTiers.name: Frailty
skillTiers.description: Not even the strongest soldier is able to defend himself while the curse feeds on their body and mind.

skillTiers.name: Command Lucifer
skillTiers.description: A true master of the dark arts might learn to call the devil himself from the throne of hell to terrorize the world for a few moments of inexpressible horror.
